message: Let's start with a fair split. Your turn!
I'll give you a smaller share, but it's still a good deal!
Not a good deal for me. I'll make a better offer next round!
You can't have it all! I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I'm not going down to 20%!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give up too much more!
You're not giving up enough! I'll try to get a better deal next round.
Getting closer to a fair deal! Your turn to decide.
